function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sharing equipment or space increases the potential risk of COVID-19 spread","Impact":"Higher risk of contributing to the spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Minimize shared equipment and spaces, and implement strict cleaning and disinfection protocols","Technologies":"Use of equipment sanitization technology, contactless payment systems, and online booking systems to manage space occupancy","People":"Youth sports organizations, players, coaches, and support staff","Owner":"Youth sports organizations, facility managers, and government health authorities"},{"Description":"Different levels of risk depending on the type of activity (individual practice, group activities, competitions)","Impact":"Increased risk based on the nature of the activity and level of interaction","Mitigation":"Adjust activities to minimize interaction, promote social distancing, and prioritize individual practice over group competitions","Technologies":"Technologies for virtual training and monitoring social distancing compliance","People":"Youth sports organizations, coaches, and players","Owner":"Youth sports organizations, sports facility managers"},{"Description":"Involvement of non-essential guests during competitions or training sessions increases the risk","Impact":"Higher risk of COVID-19 transmission due to additional individuals present","Mitigation":"Limit or restrict non-essential guests, and enforce strict visitor protocols for entry and interaction","Technologies":"Visitor management systems, health screening technology, and contact tracing apps","People":"Youth sports organizations, coaches, players, and non-essential guests","Owner":"Youth sports organizations, facility managers"}]}
